channel.title: ** How do I connect EasyRSC to this old RSCDaemon client? **
channel.description:
I have EasyRSC working with its original client and in the server settings, i am set to localhost but I can't seem to connect it to this client: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449799.msg3299734.html#msg3299734]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,449799.msg3299734.html#msg3299734[/url]
Can anybody help?
Thanks :)
